meta.ogTitle: Studio - Online Classes | Commit To Your Creativity
meta.ogDescription: Take immersive, hands-on classes taught by your favorite creators and experts. Become a better music producer, singer, baker, dancer, artist, and more.

heroData.title: Behind the scenes videos from your favorite creators
heroData.description: Get exclusive access to the real, behind-the-scenes processes of your favorite creators. Get inspired, learn, and uncover insider secrets.
heroData.pricingText: Starting at $19/mo for all classes and lessons
